page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT IN EXMOUTH
page.content: During their leisure time, many people enjoy to take part in some kind of {entertainment.}In Exmouth the entertainments availabe are:dancing, bingo,theatre,amusements and playing in the town band. There are many kinds of {dancing.} Most young people like disco dancing, Jazz,Tap and ballet dancing.Older people like ballroom dancing. People also go to {bingo }as an entertainment. Bingo is mostly for older people,but young people can go. The theatre is very popular with many people of all ages,and most people seem to enjoy a comedy. {Sport }is quite popular. Many people enjoy playing snooker,golf, football,tennis;and some people watch the main games on television.
